Send Message to Cassidy Thread

Source: R/api-core.R
cassidy_send_message.Rd

Sends a message to an existing Cassidy thread and retrieves the assistant's response.

Usage

cassidy_send_message(
  thread_id,
  message,
  api_key = Sys.getenv("CASSIDY_API_KEY"),
  timeout = 120
)

Arguments

thread_id

Character. The thread ID from cassidy_create_thread().

message

Character. The message content to send.

api_key

Character. Cassidy API key. Defaults to CASSIDY_API_KEY environment variable.

timeout

Numeric. Request timeout in seconds. Default is 120.

Value

A cassidy_response object containing:

  • content: The assistant's response text

  • thread_id: The thread ID

  • timestamp: When the response was received

See also

Other api-functions: cassidy_create_thread(), cassidy_get_thread(), cassidy_list_threads()
